data.comment: There are 20496 people in the crowd for today's match.
The first-half is just kicking off.

Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Tottenham.
Burnley's Chris Wood has run offside.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Turf Moor.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Chris Wood for Burnley gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
Throw-in Burnley.
Throw-in for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Burnley to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Burnley push forward at Turf Moor and Ben Mee gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tottenham defence.
Throw-in for Tottenham close to the penalty box.
In Burnley Burnley drive forward through Jack Cork. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Chris Wood of Burnley smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! Chris Wood gives Burnley a 1-0 lead in Burnley.
In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Tottenham defence as Phil Bardsley fires in a strike for Burnley.
Jon Moss awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Erik Lamela (Tottenham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Burnley in the half of Tottenham.
Dwight McNeil gets his shot on target but fails to score for Burnley.
Burnley's Ashley Westwood gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeff Hendrick (Burnley) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Burnley's Jay Rodriguez is whistled for offside at Turf Moor.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Burnley, Japhet Tanganga of Tottenham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tottenham drives forward and Erik Lamela gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Turf Moor.
Throw-in high up the field for Tottenham in Burnley.

Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Burnley to check on Phil Bardsley, who is grimacing with pain.
Tottenham needs to be cautious. Burnley have an attacking throw-in.
In Burnley Burnley attack through Jay Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Phil Bardsley is back on the pitch.
Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
